app_descript:
App Name: 7 Little Words
App Package Name: com.blueoxtech.sevenlittlewords

Brief:

Indulge in the world of words with "7 Little Words," a captivating puzzle game designed for the linguistically curious and the lovers of a cerebral challenge. Dive into the intriguing concept of matching clues to words, with no clock ticking down or penalties for mistakes. It boasts a collection of 100 free word puzzles that will quench your thirst for daily brain teasers. Whether you're a solo player or looking to compete with friends, "7 Little Words" offers an engaging way to test your cleverness and expand your vocabulary.
